name: European Group on Tort Law
headAddress: European Center of Tort and Insurance Law
goal: The European Group on Tort Law aims to contribute to the enhancement and harmonization of tort law in Europe through the framework provided by its Principles of European Tort Law (PETL) and its related and ongoing research, and in particular to provide a principled basis for rationalisation and innovation at national and EU level.
interests: Consumers, Digital economy and society, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives: Harmonisation in European private law, particularly in the field of tort law
